nodes.text: Lantillian ShipWrights was a corporation from the planet Lantillies in the Mid Rim. It worked in close relation with the Lantillian Spacers' Brotherhood.

Lantillian ShipWrights manufactured several types of starships, one of the most famous designs was the GX1 Short Hauler, mainly designed by Project Engineer Shil Tervo. Another product was the Lantillian cruiser.
Shortly after the Battle of Yavin in 0 ABY, the company was absorbed by the Tagge Company and many of its designers were fired, including Tervo.
